articles.description: Follow radio and text commentary as Fiji face Portugal with a place in the World Cup quarter-finals at stake.

articles.title: Verstappen wins in Qatar as Hamilton and Russell collide

articles.title: WSL: Liverpool 1-0 Aston Villa - Hobinger gives hosts lead

articles.title: La Liga: Barcelona concede after 17 seconds against Granada

articles.description: Virat Kohli made a decisive 85 as World Cup hosts India overcame a early collapse to begin their campaign with a seven-wicket win over Australia.
articles.title: Kohli inspires India to victory over Australia

articles.description: The 26 seconds that Alex Greenwood used up before taking a free-kick for Manchester City proved more costly than expected in their 1-1 draw with Chelsea.
articles.title: 'Ridiculous' red card mars Man City draw with Chelsea

articles.title: Kohli leads India to victory over Australia

articles.description: York Valkyrie end Leeds Rhinos' grip on the Women's Super League title and end their own wait for Grand Final glory.

articles.description: The Jacksonville Jaguars hold on for a 25-20 win over the Buffalo Bills after a thrilling finale at Tottenham Hotspur Stadium.
articles.title: Jaguars hold on to beat Bills in Tottenham thriller
